suite.name: httbinTests

kw.name: Set Service Name
kw.doc: Установка имени сервиса с которым работают методы.

kw.name: Basic Auth Request Check Creds Test
Send Auth Request
kw.doc: Получение http-ответа на auth запрос.
kw.msg: > GET http://httpbin.org/basic-auth/test/12345 > Connection: keep-alive > Authorization: Basic dGVzdDoxMjM0NQ== > Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate > Accept: */* > User-Agent: python-requests/2.9.1 > * Elapsed time: 0:00:00.312000 > < 200 OK < Content-Length: 47 < Server: nginx < Connection: keep-alive < Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true < Date: Tue, 20 Sep 2016 14:14:09 GMT < Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * < Content-Type: application/json <

kw.name: Check Status Code
kw.doc: Проверка кода http-ответа.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on given items.

kw.name: Send Get Request
kw.doc: Получение http-ответа на get запрос с переданными хидерами.
kw.msg: > GET http://httpbin.org/get > Connection: keep-alive > User-Agent: python-requests/2.9.1 > Name: TestName > Accept: */* > Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate > * Elapsed time: 0:00:00.297000 > < 200 OK < Content-Length: 259 < Server: nginx < Connection: keep-alive < Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true < Date: Tue, 20 Sep 2016 14:14:10 GMT < Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * < Content-Type: application/json <

kw.name: Check Status Code
kw.doc: Проверка кода http-ответа.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Item
kw.doc: An item of ``key``/``value`` must be found in a `dictionary`.

test.name: Stream Request Check Lines Number Test

kw.name: Set Service Name
kw.doc: Установка имени сервиса с которым работают методы.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Send Stream Request
kw.doc: Получение http-ответа на stream запрос.
kw.msg: > GET http://httpbin.org/stream/5 > Connection: keep-alive > Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate > Accept: */* > User-Agent: python-requests/2.9.1 > * Elapsed time: 0:00:00.296000 > < 200 OK < Transfer-Encoding: chunked < Server: nginx < Connection: keep-alive < Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true < Date: Tue, 20 Sep 2016 14:14:10 GMT < Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * < Content-Type: application/json <

kw.name: Check Status Code
kw.doc: Проверка кода http-ответа.

kw.name: Get Line Count
kw.doc: Returns and logs the number of lines in the given string.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

suite.doc: Проверка demo REST сервиса http://httpbin.org/ [https://jira.billing.ru/browse/PQAGAUTO-1752 | PQAGAUTO-1752]
